title: Sum of Two Numbers
description: Given two integers a and b, output their sum.

title: Factorial
solution:
import sys
n = int(sys.stdin.read().strip())
res = 1
for i in range(2, n+1):
    res *= i
print(res)

title: Reverse String
description: Given a string s, print it reversed.

title: Find Maximum
description: Given an array of integers, find and print the maximum value.
inputFormat: First line: integer n (array size). Second line: n space-separated integers.
solution:
import sys
lines = sys.stdin.read().strip().split('\n')
n = int(lines[0])
arr = list(map(int, lines[1].split()))
print(max(arr))

title: Count Vowels
description: Count the number of vowels (a, e, i, o, u) in a given string. Case insensitive.
solution:
import sys
s = sys.stdin.read().strip().lower()
vowels = 'aeiou'
count = sum(1 for c in s if c in vowels)
print(count)

title: Palindrome Check
description: Check if a given string is a palindrome (reads the same forwards and backwards). Ignore spaces and case.

title: FizzBuzz
description: For integers from 1 to n, print 'Fizz' if divisible by 3, 'Buzz' if divisible by 5, 'FizzBuzz' if divisible by both, otherwise print the number.
sampleOutput:
1
2
Fizz
4
Buzz
Fizz
7
8
Fizz
Buzz
11
Fizz
13
14
FizzBuzz

title: Array Sum
description: Calculate the sum of all elements in an array.
inputFormat: First line: integer n (array size). Second line: n space-separated integers.
solution:
import sys
lines = sys.stdin.read().strip().split('\n')
n = int(lines[0])
arr = list(map(int, lines[1].split()))
print(sum(arr))

title: Even or Odd
description: Determine if a given integer is even or odd.

title: String Length
description: Return the length of a given string (excluding newline).
